page.title: 12Games and Hobbies
page.content:
{Playing Conkers:} At the top of our field we have got some horse chestnut trees and when they are out we go and pick the conkers for a game.You get a conker from the tree,make a hole through the middle and thread some string through.(But first you soak the conker in vinegar).Then you play your oponent and you get three goes each. You have to smash your oponent's conker,by swinging your conker at it.
{Reading:}I enjoy reading,my favourite books are adventure books and detective books.I also like humerous books.My favourite authors are Enid Blyton and Franklin W.Dixon.When I read a detective book I like guessing how the story will end.I like Jennings books because they are funny and he always gets out of a tight spot.
